publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3425 Brian Adam: Aberdeen Tennis Cupâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that Aberdeen Exhibition and Conference Centre is to host the inaugural Aberdeen Cup matches between Scotland and England on 26 and 27 November 2005 and furthermore wishes the Scottish team, which will include Andrew and Jamie Murray and Elena Baltacha, all the best in their quest to beat the "auld enemy". Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mike Pringle*, Tricia Marwick*, Bruce Crawford*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3425 Aberdeen Tennis Cup (lodged on 17 October 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3425 Aberdeen Tennis Cup (lodged on 17 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3425 Aberdeen Tennis Cup (lodged on 17 October 2005) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-3425 Aberdeen Tennis Cup (lodged on 17 October 2005) Michael Matheson*
